bill.title: Developmental services.
bill.description: An act to amend Section 95004 of the Government Code, to amend Section 1531.1 of, and to add Sections 1267.75 and 1531.15 to, the Health and Safety Code, to amend Sections 4418.25, 4418.7, 4507, 4519, 4640.6, 4648, 4684.53, 4684.65, 4684.74, 4689, 4791, 6000, 6500, 6501, 6502, 6504, 6504.5, 6506, 6507, 6508, 6509, 6511, 6512, 7502.5, and 7507 of, and to add Sections 4519.5, 4792.1, 6510.5, and 7505 to, the Welfare and Institutions Code, and to amend Section 10 of Chapter 13 of the Third Extraordinary Session of the Statutes of 2009, relating to developmental services, and making an appropriation therefor, to take effect immediately, bill related to the budget.

history.action: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after March 8.
Withdrawn from committee. (Ayes 24. Noes 14. Page 2916.) Ordered to second reading.
Read second time. Ordered to third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 23. Noes 10. Page 2977.) Ordered to the Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on BUDGET.
Withdrawn from committee. (Ayes 47. Noes 25. Page 5301.) Ordered to second reading. Read second time. Ordered to third reading.

votes.desc: Senate 3rd Reading SB1012 Committee on B. & F.R. (Leno)
